name: Stadium
guide: Obtain all possible elements using only Pokémon Stadium.
-For advices to beat the cups, check Speedrun guides
-Easiest way to get "Unlock Hyper Difficulty at Kids Club" is to let the other CPUs get ahead by 5 stars each, so you get to pick the next 5 games.
Play Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow until obtaining Mewtwo. Transfer Mewtwo to Stadium. Win a cup in Pokémon Stadium with Mewtwo.

list.name: Game: Pokémon Yellow, Red or Blue
Game: Pokémon Yellow, Red or Blue
Round 1 - Mewtwo
list.location: Unlocked after completing Round 1 Gym Leader Castle and all Round 1 Stadium cups

list.name: Round 2 - Mewtwo
list.location: Unlocked after completing Round 2 Gym Leader Castle and all Round 2 Stadium cups

list.name: Bulbasaur
list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.name: Charmander
list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.name: Psyduck
list.location: Defeat your Rival while having Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow in the Transfer Pak.

list.name: Surfing Pikachu
list.location: Complete the Prime Cup Master Ball tournament in Round 2, using Pikachu in the last battle, with a team imported from Game Pak.

list.name: Unlock Doduo Game Boy
list.location: Completing the Poké Cup or the Prime Cup

list.name: Unlock Dodrio Game Boy
list.location: Completing both the Poké Cup and the Prime Cup

list.name: Unlock Hyper Difficulty at Kids Club
list.location: Win 5 consecutive mini-games against 3 Hard CPUs

list.name: All 151 Pokémon in Victory Palace
list.location: Finish any cup with all 151 Pokémon. Mewtwo must be transferred from Pokémon Red, Blue or Yellow. Mew is available in Round 2 Prime Cup.
